name: Koobit
description:
Koobit is a simple endless arcade style game about destroying blocks and reaching high scores.

Features:

  • Colorful 2D sprites
  • Addictive gameplay
  • 2 different playing modes: endless and speedrun, with potentially more to come
  • Powerups to help you reach higher scores

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows to move
  • Up arrow to shoot
  • Down arrow to activate a powerup

Credits:

Developed by Vidmantas Luneckas
